requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 7600X / Intel Core i5 14600KF 14-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A Working Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This game should run on most systems.

results.name: Car Drives Up a Mountain For Some Reason
